org.softala.roboapp.repository

Interface GivenAnswerRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GivenAnswer,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<GivenAnswer,java.lang.Long>

    public interface GivenAnswerRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GivenAnswer,java.lang.Long>
    Author:
    Tuomas Törmä, Pekko Tuomisto

    • Method Detail

      • getAnswerPerQuestion

        @Query(value="select q.text as question_text, ao.text as answer_option_text, count(ga.created) as answers from answer_option ao join given_answer ga on ga.answer_option_id = ao.answer_option_id join question q on ao.question_id = q.question_id group by ao.answer_option_id;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.ArrayList<AnswerLevelPerAnswer> getAnswerPerQuestion()
        Custom query to db. Return more spesific data
        Returns:
        ArrayList AnswerLevelPerAnswer

      • getAnswerPerQuestionPerDialog

        @Query(value="select q.text as question_text, ao.text as answer_option_text, count(ga.created) as answers from answer_option ao join given_answer ga on ga.answer_option_id = ao.answer_option_id  join question q on ao.question_id = q.question_id join dialog dia on dia.dialog_id = q.dialog_id WHERE dia.dialog_id = ? group by ao.answer_option_id;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.ArrayList<AnswerLevelPerAnswer> getAnswerPerQuestionPerDialog(java.lang.Integer id)
        Custom query that returns answers per levedl per Dialog with id is dialog id
        Parameters:
        id - Integer, Dialog id
        Returns:
        ArrayList AnswerLevelPerAnswer

      • getGivenAnswers

        @Query(value="select g.session_id, g.answer_option_id, g.created from given_answer g order by g.session_id, g.created;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.ArrayList<GivenAnswer> getGivenAnswers()
        Custom query that returns given answers with specific data
        Returns:
        ArrayList GivenAnswer

      • getGivenAnsswerByDialogId

        @Query(value="select g.session_id, g.answer_option_id, g.created from given_answer g JOIN answer_option a ON g.answer_option_id = a.answer_option_id  JOIN question gu ON a.question_id = gu.question_id JOIN dialog d ON d.dialog_id = gu.dialog_id  WHERE d.dialog_id = ? order by g.session_id, g.created;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.ArrayList<GivenAnswer> getGivenAnsswerByDialogId(java.lang.Integer id)
        Custom query that returns given answer specific data from certain Dialog
        Parameters:
        id - Integer, Dialog id
        Returns:
        ArrayList GivenAnswer
